name: Koto na Kare
nutshell: An absurd occult horror. In the city hall of a certain city near Tokyo lies a special office known as the "Nagare Division" made up of people with special abilities. They are responsible for investigating so-called urban legends, and making sure the unknown stays unknown.

name: The iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls Valentine's Day
nutshell:
Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: I Suggested the Doctor, Who Works for a Secret Evil Organization, to Take a Vacation
My Girlfriend Is Long Aotian
nutshell: In legends, the most powerful person in the world is called Long Aotian... I always thought it was the name of a man, but she was actually the name of a beautiful woman?! She can make people think she's amazing without knowing why with just a cold smile, and bring people to their knees with a single stomp! She can flatten mountains with a flick of her hand! She can tear the skies open with a single finger! She is invincible and unparalleled in the world! However most importantly... She is my girlfriend and listens to everything I say!

name: Old-fashioned Cupcake
nutshell: Sleep, wake, and work — sums up the day-to-day life of 39-year old, Nozue. A routine that eases him, and conversely weighs heavily on him — which worries the hard-eyed but reliable Togawa, a 29-year old subordinate of his. In an unexpected turn of events, the two of them end up visiting a pancake shop bustling with girls.

name: Teenage Swordsman
tags: Action,Long Strip,Survival,Martial Arts,Adventure,Virtual Reality,Video Games,Isekai,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: ‘Quest Hero’ is a VR online game that has received attention worldwide. One day, one of their named users, ‘Harang’, was pulled into another world by an unknown sword-like object. No matter how hard he tried, he wasn’t able to log out and was even attacked… Not only did he feel ‘real’ pain, he also meet the ‘real’ Yuta instead of the npc Yuta. Would Harang be able to complete the ‘7th Quest and return back to the real world safely?! The journey of the ‘Adolescent Warrior’ who fell into an unknown world!

name: Boku no Tenohira de Odore
nutshell:
I first met Yuko in school's infirmary. I'd give her all of myself…my hair, skin, lips, everything. They are all hers, and I want to have all of her…she'll be mine forever. Dance on my palm…her sighs, her tears, everything.
Includes two other stories:


Renai Junbishitsu


Tanabota-Shiki Renairon

name: Moon Land
nutshell: Mitsuki Amahara is an avid gymnast in his third year of middle school, but it's not until the final middle school competition that he competes for the first time. There, he is taken aback by the stunning performance of Sakura Dogase, a member of a renowned club. What will Mitsuki do in order to get closer to his goal…?!

name: Snow Ridge, Sword Dance
nutshell:
The closing stages of Sengoku (Warring States) Japan. A setting commonly explored in Japanese manga through vivid scenes of gory battles, samurai, and feats of bravery, honour, and loyalty. IWAAKI Hitoshi dares to go against the popular grain by not focusing on the 3 famous unifiers, but by depicting stories of a society in transition. Rapidly changing cultural norms and class expectations pit the old versus the young, the war-weary versus the war-mongers, and the parochial versus the foward-thinking.
The first story, "Snow Ridge", explores the changing role of samurai and provinces while the second story, "Sword Dance", deals with kendo's early evolution from warfare to art.
Chapter 1-4: Snow Ridge
Chapter 5-9: Sword Dance

name: Jun and Wang Xin
nutshell: Lu Wang Xin is the young miss of Yun Jian Mountain Villa. She fell in love with Xia Hou You. However, after Xia Hou You ascended the throne, he put Lu Wang Xin into the Cold Palace. Heartbroken, Lu Wang Xin died. Reborn at age 16, Lu Wang Xin embarked on the road of revenge…

name: Botsuraku Reijou no Ikoku Kekkonroku
nutshell:
"Starting today, you are my wife."
To pay off the debt of her once-wealthy family, the beautiful Leyfa is sold off as "a rare item that will bring prosperity" and taken to a distant empire. There she met the handsome, but sickly head of the family, Shin Yu. Living the imperial life and suddenly married to a cool, mysterious husband, Leyfa uses her cooking prowess to become the "ideal married couple"!

name: Wow Toilet
nutshell: After getting hit by the flush handle of a toilet, Agueda "Agu" starts seeing weird creatures that resemble various things.

name: Tengu no Daidokoro
nutshell:
New Yorker On will be shown the wonderful and sweet perks of slow life by his skilled cook brother (Who’s actually a Tengu!).
On, a boy from New York discovers he is a descendant of a Tengu. According to their traditions, after reaching 14 he must spend a year of seclusion in Japan with his older brother: Motoi Izuna. Tengu aren’t particularly powerful, they live a simple life working in the fields and enjoy cooking, which only disappoints On. His interest only gets caught after discovering his brother has wings! Will he also develop Tengu powers!?

name: Seiyuu Mashimashi Club
nutshell: Four-panel manga about girls who aim to be the top voice actresses.

name: Soba ni Oitene
nutshell: As far as Yuzu remembers, since his childhood, Icchan would always come to his rescue just like a prince in shiny armour – but Yuzu has grown taller than Icchan. A huge princess and an ultra popular handsome prince?!

name: Warcraft: Shadow Wing
nutshell: In Warcraft: The Sunwell Trilogy, a good-natured but brash blue dragon, Tyrygosa, and the human Jorad Mace, a paladin struggling to reconnect with the Light, emerged victorious in the Ghostlands after ending the undead Scourge's quest to obtain the Sunwell's potent energies. Yet as arduous as that task was, Tyri and Jorad's journey is far from over. Both are drawn into the Dark Portal and transported to the shattered world of Outland, where they encounter a group of enigmatic creatures unlike any they have ever seen: the incorporeal nether dragons. Observing everything is the ruthless Ragnok Bloodreaver, one of the original death knights created prior to the Second War. This undead terror has dark plans for the nether dragons, and if his agenda comes to pass, all of Outland, including Tyri and Jorad, will suffer.

name: Final Fantasy VII - Maidream (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Two short light Tifa x Aerith stories. The first features the duo reopening Seventh Heaven as…. a Maid Cafe!? The second is an AU story where Aerith and Tifa work as maids under a slighty eccentric mistress.

name: Rain Gaiden - Vampire Master
nutshell:
A tale from Rain's younger days when he was searching for a new teacher:
Upon the death of his old master, a young swordsman embarks on a journey to the legendary Country of the Mist where the one he was recommended to is said to reside.

name: Mi Dulce Ex-esposa
nutshell: Ye Jin Xiu feliz por la noticia de su embarazo se dirige hacia su casa, pero llegando encuentra a su marido con su amante quién además le pide hacer un trío (3P)…¿Cuál será su reacción?¿Tolelará la traición?

name: Golden Bullet
nutshell: Grant saved Allen from death one day, and is now the main culprit behind Allen’s miserable life. Everyday Grant restrains Allen and treats him as a toy for relieving his sexual desires. Day by day, Allen’s emotions run dry staying in Grant’s cage-like apartment. And there is AJ, who is akin to Grant’s dog seeing that he fulfills all of his dirty deeds. AJ also grooms Grant’s “toy”, Allen, at the behest of Grant. These three then start getting entangled in a bitter relationship….

name: Hatsukoi Lollipop
nutshell:
Seo has been in high school for little more than 2 months. She likes schools that allow casual clothes, however the annoying, stupid guy, Narusawa Shin is really hard to deal with. Could such men really be?!
Included one-shot: Mikazuki Lock

name: The President's Contract Lover
nutshell: She’s a poor orphan girl leading a rough life, yet why does the President give her special treatment? What mysterious past lies behind the President’s stony demeanor?

name: Nanto Magoroku
nutshell: Magoroku is a freshman from Namishiro high that posses a very great talent to become a koshien-level pitcher but he's not satisfy with that as namishiro is known as brutal high school, so with his power beyond ordinary human he also try to conquer the school.

name: Haikyu!! - Dream Impact - UshiOi Nakayoshi Sakusen (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Ushijima Wakatoshi x Oikawa Tooru

name: Sofure Buka!
nutshell:
"Please, no more… Save me, Nakamuraaah…!"
With the stress from work and his girlfriend, Seta's body, mind and spirit are all reaching their breaking point. Then along comes his subordinate – body pillow fanatic Nakamura, who proposes that they become sleep buddies: friends who sleep next to each other. With his mental state stretched to its limits, he decides to try it; but seriously, with a guy?! Buuut… why does it feel so nice to be enveloped in the strong arms of his brash subordinate?

name: Fukyagaku-sei no himawari
nutshell: I am Hiroo. My brother, Nao, who had left home at 18, died in an accident. Nao ran away from home because he had a bad relationship with our parents. Hiroo decides to go to the house where Nao used to live with his lover to sort out his brother's momentos. Then, for some reason, he found his brother still “alive” there. Apparently, Hiroo flew to the past ...?

name: Sonna Me de Minai De
nutshell:
Honami has a thing for glasses boy on a usual day in the class, comes a super cool glasses wearing boy!?
Included one-shots: Suki Sugi Chatte Gomennasai, Namida ga Yuki ni Kawaru Koku

name: Four-way Stop
nutshell: "A spell to change the genre of your life!” Yeah, that’d be nice. So far, Juwon’s existence has been pretty ordinary: a boring daily routine with zero romance to speak of. Then one day, he sees a movie where the main character’s life suddenly turns into a rom-com. Things have been weird ever since. Surely it can’t be down to the movie, but… guys just won’t leave him alone! His childhood friend, the cute barista from the coffee shop, his mean classmate, AND his first love?! Four hotties, all at once! Now Juwon stands at a crossroads. Which way will he turn? A new series from the creator of “Can't Take My Eyes Off You!"

name: Ano Hito wa Chi o Motomete Shimau
Kuchi to Kuchi ga Fureta dake.
nutshell: Pairing: Naruto x Sasuke
